verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [V: nominated] [ARG1: the state of Ohio 's solicitor and a U.S. Justice Department official] [ARG2: to sit on the 6th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals] .
President Donald Trump on Thursday nominated [ARG1: the state of Ohio 's solicitor and a U.S. Justice Department official] to [V: sit] [ARG2: on the 6th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals] .
